title: Between Now and Heartbreak
description: Part Two in the heart wrenching, sexy and surprising Forever Trilogy.He was searching for the truth. I was living a lie. Our paths should never have crossed. Yet, when we kissed it felt like destiny. Falling in love was messyWe broke rules we should have followed.We made promises we couldnâ€™t keep. Forever felt impossible.Heartbreak was inevitable.Always would cost us everything.
author: Dylan  Allen
